TEA TREE OIL BODY WASH
OUR MOST POPULAR SOAP FOR ATHLETES

Fighting Goat Soap products are handmade in Denver, Colorado. Each recipe has been researched and tested with athletes in mind. Each has been designed to take advantage of unique, all-natural ingredients for a deep, moisturizing clean and to improve the health of your skin.

Fighting Goat Soap is also very popular among athletes to toss into their gym bags for showering after a workout. Great for hair too!

All-Natural Tea Tree Oil Body Wash

  • Citric Acid
  • Tea Tree Oil
  • Ethanol

FIGHTING GOAT SOAP WAS BORN
FROM PERSONAL EXPERIENCE

Yeah, we're a little different from the other bath and body companies that design soaps for athletes. That's because part of
our love of the outdoors and active living involves farming and raising goats.

WE BELIEVE THIS SETS US APART: WE'RE ON A FIRST-NAME BASIS WITH OUR SOURCE OF GOAT MILK FOR OUR soaps.

THIS IS
THELMA

She's the matriarch of our herd, and darn good at her job.

We can literally tell you which animal produced the milk in each batch of soap we make.
